title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Feb 12 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Feb 12 2022
description:
Dr. Leana Wen and a bunch of Dem Govs suddenly change their tune about masking. Clay and Buck think there's a good chance it was a coordinated effort in order to avoid attack! Psaki on masks in schools. Masking kids will be this generation's Vietnam, Clay says, "with all the biggest proponents going to pretend that there was never any other option and that they always questioned whether it made sense." Awful Trudeau calls Canadian truckers Nazis. C&B say it's outrageous to call them Nazis and point out the many ways they say Trudeau lies. Clay called it: Andrew Cuomo tries comeback -- and just may win! Leftist comedian Russell Brand mocks CNN's Stelter. C&B say Stelter has no fans, could never draw a crowd at a speaking event, was Zucker's puppet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dr. Leana Wen and a bunch of Dem Govs suddenly change their tune about masking. Clay and Buck think there's a good chance it was a coordinated effort in order to avoid attack! Psaki on masks in schools. Masking kids will be this generation's Vietnam, Clay says, "with all the biggest proponents going to pretend that there was never any other option and that they always questioned whether it made sense." Awful Trudeau calls Canadian truckers Nazis. C&B say it's outrageous to call them Nazis and point out the many ways they say Trudeau lies. Clay called it: Andrew Cuomo tries comeback -- and just may win! Leftist comedian Russell Brand mocks CNN's Stelter. C&B say Stelter has no fans, could never draw a crowd at a speaking event, was Zucker's puppet.
